c1.name: Tidal Illusion
c1.descriptionRaw:
Every time <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.
c1.description:
Every time Icetide Vortex's Grimheart stacks are consumed, Eula's Physical DMG is increased by 30% for 6s.
Each stack consumed will increase the duration of this effect by 6s up to a maximum of 18s.

c2.name: Lady of Seafoam
c2.descriptionRaw: #Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color>'s Holding Mode, rendering it identical to {LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tapping}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press} CD.
c2.description: Decreases the CD of Icetide Vortex's Holding Mode, rendering it identical to Press CD.

c3.name: Lawrence Pedigree
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Glacial Illumination by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: The Obstinacy of One's Inferiors
c4.descriptionRaw: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.
c4.description: Lightfall Swords deal 25% increased DMG against opponents with less than 50% HP.

c5.name: Chivalric Quality
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Icetide Vortex</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Icetide Vortex by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Noble Obligation
c6.descriptionRaw: Lightfall Swords created by <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Illumination</color> start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.
c6.description: Lightfall Swords created by Glacial Illumination start with 5 stacks of energy. Normal Attacks, Elemental Skills, and Elemental Bursts have a 50% chance to grant the Lightfall Sword an additional stack of energy.
